document.full_text: rescuers on monday brought in a second remote-controlled digging machine and sought to drill an air hole as they raced to free a miner trapped since friday by a cave-in at an idaho silver mine.
document.title: rescuers seek to drill air hole for trapped idaho miner
lines_and_colors: rescuers on monday brought in a second remote-controlled digging machine and sought to drill an air hole as they raced to free a miner trapped since friday by a cave-in at an idaho silver mine.
